NPC.name: frog girl
NPC.description: A curvaceously figured humanoid, her skin a smooth brilliant emerald over all but her pale cream belly and she wears not a shred of clothing about her body. Her amphibious form possessed of hefty tits, ample thighs and a soft padded belly. She eyes you with an undeniably predatory air and a preposterously long tongue flicks out of her mouth a moment with the air of a living hose unfurling from a reel.

missText.text: The froggy snaps out a powerful kick that does not connect with TARGET
TARGET evades a kick from the froggy

hitText.text: The frog girl kicks TARGET for VALUE damage

missText.text: The frog girl fails to lick TARGET

hitText.text: TARGET loses VALUE resolve to the teasing licks of the frog girl

missText.text: the frog girl lashes out her tongue at TARGET who dodges the attack.
the frog girl's amazingly long tail snaps out and flicks harmlessly past TARGET before reeling back in.

hitText.text: the frog girl lashes out her tongue at TARGET and wraps it around her briefly, tugging her closer
the frog girl snags TARGET with her tongue and hauls them closer
